basics.name: Juan Anibal Micheli
basics.label: Fullstack Javascript Engineer
basics.summary: I am a creative, dynamic, curious, prolific web developer. I like feeling comfortable with the entire stack needed for a web project, from layout and client-side application structure, to backend development and server infrastructure. I am always pursuing new technologies, frameworks and libraries, and I believe web technologies will be soon a multi-platform standard, used for common mobile apps and even for programming robots! And of course, I am in love with Javascript :)

works.summary: ES6/ES7, Redux, React, NodeJS, ExpressJS, React Router, lazy-loading (chunks), critical rendering path

Built an event promotion platform from scratch using MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS and Node.js.
Choice of technologies, decision taking, devising.
A lot of interaction with Facebook API (Graph API, FQL, invitations, RSVP..). SEO, web scraping, geospatial search, frontend performance optimization, POC with Polymer.
Built an admin panel for administrating the main site entities. I used AngularJS and Bootstrap UI communicating with a RPC-JSON API with JWT based authentification.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

works.summary:
PHP, Symfony2, MySQL, Elastic Search, Redis, agile development.
Digital TV channel, music and sport fans.
I worked with Symfony2, a great PHP MVC framework, with Doctrine ORM, implemented Elasticsearch for indexing the entities and search them, and Redis for caching DB queries and with Nginx proxy for caching webpages.

PHP, NodeJS, Mongodb, MySQL, JQuery, Magento, social API's and some Magento e-commerce.
I worked in several little (2 weeks) projects, pressure and innovation in a digital agency.

works.position: Web Developer (PHP, Zend framework, MySQL, Frontend and Backend development)
works.summary:
PHP, Zend framework, OAuth, Facebook API
Football social network.
Facebook integration, chat, mail invitations, frontend and backend development.

works.position: Web Developer (PHP, Symfony, MySQL, HTML5, CSS3, Frontend and Backend development)

Symfony, MySQL
Several projects, rapid web development, Symfony 1.2 - 1.4, Doctrine, Mysql. Layout & backend development.

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.ss
